issue.title: [Go] Slice of slice causes index out of range panic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When slicing a slice, the offset of the underlying data will cause an index out of range panic if the offset if greater than the slice length. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/5033>
